verses.verse: Praise to God for His Holiness (Ex 25.22) The LORD is king; let the peoples tremble! He sits enthroned upon the cherubim; let the earth quake!
(Ps 97.9) The LORD is great in Zion; he is exalted over all the peoples.
Let them praise your great and awesome name. Holy is he!
(Ps 11.7; 17.2; 103.6) Mighty King, (Cn: Heb And a kingâ€™s strength) lover of justice, you have established equity; you have executed justice and righteousness in Jacob.
(Lev 19.2; Ps 132.7) Extol the LORD our God; worship at his footstool. Holy is he!
(Ex 14.15; 1 Sam 7.9; Jer 15.1) Moses and Aaron were among his priests, Samuel also was among those who called on his name. They cried to the LORD, and he answered them.
(Ex 33.9) He spoke to them in the pillar of cloud; they kept his decrees and the statutes that he gave them.
(Num 14.20; Deut 9.20; Ps 106.44) O LORD our God, you answered them; you were a forgiving God to them but an avenger of their wrongdoings.
(Ps 34.3) Extol the LORD our God, and worship at his holy mountain, for the LORD our God is holy.
